content.p: Discover helpful resources for your academic journey and campus life at UNM. Download the brochures below for comprehensive information about the University including our programmes, strategic plans and more. We invite you to explore all we have to offer and embark on a transformative educational experience with us. The comprehensive guide to our foundation, undergraduate and postgraduate programmes which include fees, modules and more. 马来西亚诺丁汉大学招生简章 A concise guide for international students featuring UNM's top programmes, facilities, and fees. This guide explores salary insights, potential employers, and inspirational alumni success stories. Your essential guide to a seamless start at UNM from campus facilities to university contacts. UNM’s aspirational roadmap for goals in research, student engagement, sustainability and more. The faculty’s strategic plans and commitments in areas like learning experience, curriculum, research and more. UNM and CNN Academy partner up for digital storytelling training, empowering journalists with expert-led modules. UNM leads regional environmental research, education, and initiatives for waste reduction and energy efficiency. UNM aims for global engagement through partnerships, cross-border education, mobility opportunities, and corporate collaborations. General enquiries: +60 3 8924 8000 Monday - Friday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays) Programme enquiries: +60 3 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia
